name: Katamari Physics Demo
description:
This is a small physics demo, implementing similar core mechanics in famous Katamari Damacy games.

Here I added two mechanics to the core mechnic: 

  • Explode: Creates small explosions around the ball, causing pieces to fly around.
  • Magnet: Pulls objects that are small enough to stick on the ball, allowing the ball to grow very swiftly.
